description: red; body of telephone is housed inside purse; push-button pad on face of purse; hand-set attached with red spiral cord to left of dial; hand-set rests on top of purse handle which wraps around it and is held in place with velcro
dimension: 3 x 10 x 11 in. (7.62 x 25.4 x 27.94 cm) (without strap)
text: As if anticipating the cell phone, the "Handbag" phone is designed for callers on the go.  Its carrying case and attached phone jack is ready-made to be plugged into any available phone line jack .  An added practicality: there's room to accommodate a portable telephone directory if needed.
title: "Handbag" telephone
